content: {"name": "Salvation Army in Central OH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Seniors age 60 and over who meet income guidelines of 130% of the Federal Poverty Level and live in Franklin County are eligible to receive a monthly senior food box.  For more information call 614.437.2134.", "email": "", "url": "easternusa.salvationarmy.org/southwest-ohio/central-ohio/alleviate-hunger", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "966 East Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Near East Side", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9582252, "longitude": -82.97347289999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 341-2282", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
